name: Lago Tongue Attack
description:
Help Lago to cross the arid and rocky desert.

  • Choose Difficulty level: Beginner, Advanced, Expert
  • Play the entire campaign or play a single stage
  • Try to get the maximum score in campaign as on stages
  • Top ten Hall of fame
  • Soundtracks and sound effects
  • Select text language (English, Spanish, French)
Stage one: The awakening

Start your adventure by exploring and uncovering the hidden mysteries in RockyDesert. Solve the mechanisms to progress.

Stage two: Safe house

Take refuge in a safehouse to plan your movements and set up ambushes.

Stage three: The oracle

Prehistoric megalithic complex, built by an ancient defunct civilization. Move between the stones in short distances and fast turns.

Stage four: The bridge

The bridge is a strategic point. Choose the right moment to cross it.

Stage five: Crossroad

Intersections are dangerous. Seek shelter under bridges.

Stage six: The water of life

Your water reserve runs out. Drink from sources to avoid dehydration.

Install instructions:

Requires Java 8 or above. If you can't run the application by double clicking, try running "java -jar LagoRD.jar".
